resources.string: Use this form to provide a daily report of any symptoms you have. You may submit this form once a day.
You\'ve received a positive diagnosis from your healthcare provider. To confirm your diagnosis, please provider your credentials below.
You can use this panel to create a 1 mile radius around locations you don\'t want to be tracked. You can add up to %1$d locations.
We are currently logging your location.
Based on your location history, we believe you might have been in the same place as people infected with COVID-19.
Please check the box to certify that all the information in this form is correct.
Please check at least one symptom.
The address you have entered is invalid. Please try again.
Location access must be enabled at all times for tracking to take place. Please try again.
Enable Bluetooth and GPS in settings to start logging.
Without this permission, we will be unable to capture location information. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
We require access to location information when the app is closed. Would you like to open app settings to enable this?
Without this permission, we will be unable to capture Bluetooth information of users around you. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
We require access to Bluetooth information when the app is closed. Would you like to open app settings to enable this?
Without this permission, we will be unable to send you notifications. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
We require push notifications to be enabled. Would you like to open app settings to enable this?
Without this permission, we will be unable to track your location when the app is closed. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
We require access to location information when the app is closed. Would you like to open app settings to enable this?

Limited trace data is being collected. We keep your identity anonymous.
Learn More

Turn broadcasting on to improve the accuracy of your notifications.
Learn More

Enable real-time notifications to get alerts about potential exposure and public health messages relevant to you.\n\nCovidSafe reveals no information about you without your consent.
Receive notifications for exposure risks in your area.
Receive announcements and notifications relevant to your neighborhood. All location information is stored locally.
Emit and detect random numbers by Bluetooth to later discover exposure risks.
Number of days until local logs are automatically deleted.
CovidSafe notifies you if you may have been exposed to coronavirus and helps you monitor any symptoms you\'re having.
Learn if you might have been exposed. If you\'ve recently visited a location with a risk of COVID-19 exposure, you\'ll get a notification letting you know.
Take care of yourself and others. Get self-care tips, connect with a healthcare professional if your symptoms worsen, and report locations you recently visited to protect others.
Any information you contribute is protected. Learn more about how your information is used and protected on the Privacy page in Settings.
Let\s slow the spread of COVID-19 together.
Persistent pain or pressure in the chest
New confusion or inability to arouse
I certify that the information submitted in this report is true and correct to the best of my knowledge.
I certify that I have been officially diagnosed with COVID-19
